fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
You seem to all investigatives to be a Sponge (4336), and a Town member.
During the day, people may vote to squeeze you. If this vote passes, the day immediately ends and you modkill 3 players of your choice before the Night starts, with these deaths being revealed before Night starts. You also get modkilled. If you were the last surviving Rock faction player, a random player who you could not have won with gets converted into Pebble (744).
